PackageOracle.name: DA_INBOUND_CALL_SEGMENT
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_INBOUND_CALL_SEGMENT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.56.172806000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,ani_match_ind IN VARCHAR2
,answering_disposition_id IN NUMBER
,answering_split_id IN NUMBER
,answering_vdn_id IN VARCHAR2
,call_transfer_ind IN NUMBER
,collected_digits_match_ind IN VARCHAR2
,collected_digits_num IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,edu_id IN VARCHAR2
,first_vector_id IN NUMBER
,first_vdn_id IN VARCHAR2
,original_logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,prior_answer_id IN NUMBER
,split_1_id IN NUMBER
,inbound_call_id IN NUMBER
,segment_num IN NUMBER
,record_key_id IN VARCHAR2
,universal_call_id IN VARCHAR2
,segment_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,segment_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,dialed_num IN VARCHAR2
,calling_party_num IN VARCHAR2
,duration_seconds_qty IN NUMBER
,on_hold_seconds_qty IN NUMBER
,answering_associate_id IN NUMBER
,answering_logon_id IN NUMBER
,answering_vector_id IN NUMBER
,account_id IN NUMBER
,agent_after_call_work_time_qty IN NUMBER
,agent_talk_time_qty IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,inbound_call_id IN NUMBER
,segment_num IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_inbound_call_segment;

body.name: DA_INBOUND_CALL_SEGMENT
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_INBOUND_CALL_SEGMENT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.56.184560000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,ani_match_ind IN VARCHAR2
,answering_disposition_id IN NUMBER
,answering_split_id IN NUMBER
,answering_vdn_id IN VARCHAR2
,call_transfer_ind IN NUMBER
,collected_digits_match_ind IN VARCHAR2
,collected_digits_num IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,edu_id IN VARCHAR2
,first_vector_id IN NUMBER
,first_vdn_id IN VARCHAR2
,original_logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,prior_answer_id IN NUMBER
,split_1_id IN NUMBER
,inbound_call_id IN NUMBER
,segment_num IN NUMBER
,record_key_id IN VARCHAR2
,universal_call_id IN VARCHAR2
,segment_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,segment_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,dialed_num IN VARCHAR2
,calling_party_num IN VARCHAR2
,duration_seconds_qty IN NUMBER
,on_hold_seconds_qty IN NUMBER
,answering_associate_id IN NUMBER
,answering_logon_id IN NUMBER
,answering_vector_id IN NUMBER
,account_id IN NUMBER
,agent_after_call_work_time_qty IN NUMBER
,agent_talk_time_qty IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_inbound_call_segment.add, parms=' || ani_match_ind || '|' || answering_disposition_id || '|' || answering_split_id || '|' || answering_vdn_id || '|' || call_transfer_ind || '|' || collected_digits_match_ind || '|' || collected_digits_num || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || edu_id || '|' || first_vector_id || '|' || first_vdn_id || '|' || original_logon_id || '|' || prior_answer_id || '|' || split_1_id || '|' || inbound_call_id || '|' || segment_num || '|' || record_key_id || '|' || universal_call_id || '|' || segment_start_dttm || '|' || segment_end_dttm || '|' || dialed_num || '|' || calling_party_num || '|' || duration_seconds_qty || '|' || on_hold_seconds_qty || '|' || answering_associate_id || '|' || answering_logon_id || '|' || answering_vector_id || '|' || account_id || '|' || agent_after_call_work_time_qty || '|' || agent_talk_time_qty || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_inbound_call_segment a
(
a.ani_match_ind
,a.answering_disposition_id
,a.answering_split_id
,a.answering_vdn_id
,a.call_transfer_ind
,a.collected_digits_match_ind
,a.collected_digits_num
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.edu_id
,a.first_vector_id
,a.first_vdn_id
,a.original_logon_id
,a.prior_answer_id
,a.split_1_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.inbound_call_id
,a.segment_num
,a.record_key_id
,a.universal_call_id
,a.segment_start_dttm
,a.segment_end_dttm
,a.dialed_num
,a.calling_party_num
,a.duration_seconds_qty
,a.on_hold_seconds_qty
,a.answering_associate_id
,a.answering_logon_id
,a.answering_vector_id
,a.account_id
,a.agent_after_call_work_time_qty
,a.agent_talk_time_qty
)
VALUES
(
add.ani_match_ind
,add.answering_disposition_id
,add.answering_split_id
,add.answering_vdn_id
,add.call_transfer_ind
,add.collected_digits_match_ind
,add.collected_digits_num
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.edu_id
,add.first_vector_id
,add.first_vdn_id
,add.original_logon_id
,add.prior_answer_id
,add.split_1_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
,add.inbound_call_id
,add.segment_num
,add.record_key_id
,add.universal_call_id
,add.segment_start_dttm
,add.segment_end_dttm
,add.dialed_num
,add.calling_party_num
,add.duration_seconds_qty
,add.on_hold_seconds_qty
,add.answering_associate_id
,add.answering_logon_id
,add.answering_vector_id
,add.account_id
,add.agent_after_call_work_time_qty
,add.agent_talk_time_qty
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_inbound_call_segment.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,inbound_call_id IN NUMBER
,segment_num IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_inbound_call_segment.del, parms=' || inbound_call_id || '|' || segment_num || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_inbound_call_segment a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.inbound_call_id = del.inbound_call_id
AND a.segment_num = del.segment_num
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_inbound_call_segment.del');

END del;

END da_inbound_call_segment;
